data.title: Actor Refuses To Star With Nazi Favorite
data.meta_description: The Munich newspaper "Abend Zeitung" says that Austrian-horn British actor Anton Walbrook went to ...
data.text:
man}' to play the leading role

in a film without Knowing who

his leading lady was.

They met for the first time

at a party—and Walbrook. after

looking speechless at the lady,

walked out. ? I,

The lady was beautiful Czech-1"

born Lida Baarova, one-time

favorite actress of Nazi Pro

paganda Minister Goebbels. j

Walbrook told the producers

of the film that he regarded

negotiations as broken off.

To his friends Me said: —"I

don't know the lady. I regard

it as an offence to my human

and artistic dignity to have

been suggested as a co-star to

Baarova."
